original_title: ส่อง ส่ง ผี
overview: Aom is haunted by horrible nightmares which can’t be named & explained, she gets sicker every time she got the nightmare. During her visit to her 80 years old grandma, she find out that, her grandma who looked more dead than alive, is hosting and feeding a ghost. Will Aom accept her fate to also host the ghost with her body & soul.
title: The Presence
